info.name: log display in KWGR614 Netgear Router
info.description:
Modifies width of system log display in KWGR614 Netgear Router or copy to your Firefox userContent.css file then open log page as separate tab, or in page frame drag frame margin to make larger.

ATTENTION! It is assumed you use a router address in the range 192.168.*.* change  -moz-document url below to reflect your address before using
info.additionalInfo:
KWGR614 router log page is http://192.168.1.1/log.html
open link by typing in url after login or choose side bar "logs" link and open 
in new window
